description: Number of partitions of n into parts congruent to 1 mod 4.
links: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
mathematica: nmax=100; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/(1-x^(4*k+1)),{k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 26 2015 *)
